function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The number of covid-19 infections depends on the growth rate of infections on all previous days.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Job insecurity and financial concerns leading to poor mental health","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in conducting traditional the calibration of both the underlying crowd model and exposed","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changing public knowledge affects study results","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Foretelling of the new normal in architectural and urban theory literature.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying solely on online
